relation: Ghoul minions are always present. Send ghoul to attack any enemy you aren't attacking. Use diseases to increase damage dealt to opponents.
Equip items that boost Strength, Hit Rating, Hast Rating, and Critical Strike Rating.
Use ghoul to stun enemies. Spread diseases to as many enemies as possible.
Unholy Frenzy grants an ally 20% extra melee and ranged attack speed.

textBeforeTable: Abomination's Might increases entire raid's Attack by an extra 10%. Horn of Winter boosts raid's Strength and Agility. Boost Stamina quickly, then your defensive stats. Cataclysm 81 - 85 Have enemies focus on you, allowing  the Death Knight to take most of the damage. Coordinate with group's healer to keep you alive. Can survive for a considerable amount of time against enemies by using Death Strike. Cast diseases on opponents to maximize damage. Levels 55 - 80 Group Solo Blood Death Knight Play Styles Will of the Forsaken Charm, Fear, and Sleep effects. Shadow spells are not as likely to hit an Undead Death Knight. Blood Undead Berserking
textAfterTable: Unholy Death Knight Solo Group Levels 55 - 80 Ghoul minions are always present. Send ghoul to attack any enemy you aren't attacking. Use diseases to increase damage dealt to opponents. Use ghoul to stun enemies. Spread diseases to as many enemies as possible. Cataclysm 81 - 85 Equip items that boost Strength, Hit Rating, Hast Rating, and Critical Strike Rating. Unholy Frenzy grants an ally 20% extra melee and ranged attack speed. Druid The Druid class can effectively take on any role, due to their shapeshifting abilities. They also have a varied selection of nature- and arcane-based spells. Advantages by Race Alliance
